ValidationRule.description: BODEV-363: prohibits from changing Sales price and/or Quantity of immutable package products.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS($User.LastName, "Bypass")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "System Administrator")), NOT(ISNEW()), Cannot_Delete_From_Package__c = TRUE, ISCHANGED(Quantity) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change Sales price and Quantity of package products.
